pageContent: Purpose: We sought to compare changes in patient-reported quality of life (PRQOL) following stereotactic body radiation therapy (SBRT), high dose rate (HDR), and low dose rate (LDR) brachytherapy for prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Sexuality and exercise in men undergoing androgen deprivation therapy for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25005233/
